DOC.brief_summary: This feasibility study evaluate acceptability preliminary effectiveness digital health game intervention support tobacco-related health literacy 10- 13-year-old early adolescent . One third study participant receive health game , third web page similar content one third act control group without intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Digital Health Game Intervention Supporting Tobacco-related Health Literacy Early Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Goes school 4th , 5th 6th grade Understands communicate either Finnish , Swedish English Has daily access either smart phone tablet computer free time Takes part specialize education
